original_text: Therefore are my loins filled with pain: pangs have taken hold upon me, as the pangs of a woman that travaileth: I was bowed down at the hearing of it; I was dismayed at the seeing of it.
korean_text: 이러므로 나의 요통이 심하여 해산이 임박한 여인의 고통 같은 고통이 나를 엄습하였으므로 내가 괴로워서 듣지 못하며 놀라서 보지 못하도다

sentences.original_text: Therefore are my loins filled with pain
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 내 허리는 고통으로 가득 찼고

sentences.original_text: pangs have taken hold upon me
as the pangs of a woman that travaileth
I was bowed down at the hearing of it
I was dismayed at the seeing of it
